markdown.markdown:
The COMET project is a true team effort; the learning materials that you see here have taken input from many writers, coders, editors, and reviewers from a variety of disciplines. > You can contact the COMET team at [comet-project@ubc.ca](mailto:comet-project@ubc.ca) * [Marina Adshade](https://economics.ubc.ca/profile/marina-adshade/) * [Jonathan Graves](https://jonathanlgraves.arts.ubc.ca/) * [Emrul Hasan](https://economics.ubc.ca/profile/emrul-hasan/) ## Research Assistants :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="30%"} **2022**
  • Colby Chambers
  • William Co
  • Paul Corcuera
  • Rathin Dharani
  • Anneke Dresselhuis
  • Colin Grimes
  • Yeow Chong Goh
  • Jonah Heyl
  • Arshiya Malik
  • Shiming Wu
  • Oliver Xu
  • Valeria Zolla
    • ::: ::: {.column width="5%"} ::: ::: {.column width="30%"} **2023**
  • Jasmine Arora
  • Angela Chen
  • Anneke Dresselhuis
  • Priyanshu Mahey
  • Mridul Manas
  • Sarthak Kwatra
  • Giulia Lo Forte
  • Kady Toure Yeo
  • Charlotte White
  • Oliver Xu
    • ::: ::: {.column width="5%"} ::: ::: {.column width="30%"} **2024**
  • Irene Berezin
  • Eric Daigle
  • Alex Haddon
  • Jane Platt
  • Priyanshu Mahey
  • Luiz Felipe Ramos
  • Avi Woodward-Kelen
    • ::: ::: ## COMET+ Partners * **UBC's Department of Geography**: [**Hewitt Lab**](https://blogs.ubc.ca/alpineplants/about-page/) - Nina Hewitt, Mike Jerowsky, and Kevin Pierce * **UBC's Department of Sociology** and the [**Center for Computational Social Science**](https://ccss.arts.ubc.ca/): [Laura K. Nelson](https://sociology.ubc.ca/profile/laura-nelson/) ## Other Members and Reviewers * [Paul Schrimpf](https://economics.ubc.ca/profile/paul-schrimpf/) * [Florian Hoffmann](https://economics.ubc.ca/profile/florian-hoffmann/) * [Shameem Chowdhury](https://economics.ubc.ca/profile/chowdhury-shameem-mahmoud/) ## Special Thanks * The [UBC TLEF](https://tlef.ubc.ca/) team, especially [Jeff Miller](https://ctlt.ubc.ca/2022/11/15/jeff-miller/) and [Jason Myers](https://ctlt.ubc.ca/2022/11/15/jason-myers/). * The team behind [QuantEcon](https://quantecon.org/), especially [Jesse Perla](https://economics.ubc.ca/profile/jesse-perla/) and [Peifan Wu](https://twitter.com/peifanwu) for their advice and support. * The [UBC CTLT](https://ctlt.ubc.ca/), [Arts ISIT](https://isit.arts.ubc.ca/), and [LT Hub](https://lthub.ubc.ca/) Teams, for their support with Jupyter and GitLab, especially [Stephen Michaud](https://ctlt.ubc.ca/2022/11/09/stephen-michaud/), [Nausheen Shafiq](https://ctlt.ubc.ca/2022/11/03/nausheen-shafiq/), and [Michael Ha](https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelha/?originalSubdomain=ca). * The UBC DataScience Slack and the Jupyter team, especially [Tiffany Timbers](https://www.stat.ubc.ca/users/tiffany-timbers), [Phil Austin](https://www.eoas.ubc.ca/people/philaustin), [Firas Moosvi](https://cmps.ok.ubc.ca/about/contact/firas-moosvi/), and the presenters and attendees at JupyterDays 2020 * The staff at the VSE for facilitating events, payments, and space use, especially [Maria Smith](https://economics.ubc.ca/profile/maria-smith/) and [Caroline Gatchalian](https://economics.ubc.ca/profile/caroline-gatchalian/) * Plus many, many, more!
